title.narrative: Improving Agricultural Production & Income in Rural Myanmar

description.narrative: Improving Agricultural Production & Income in Rural Myanmar

Summary KMSS Myanmar's contribution The purpose is to improve the socioeconomic conditions of farming communities from three township under East Bago region.. This project aims to increase food security and incomes of smallholder farmers , women, women headed households,, seasonal workers through improved production practices, farming practices, diversified income generation activities by formation of SHGs, and support necessary technical trainings and networking .
Three townships in East and west Bago region, namely Gyopingauk, Min Hla, Kyakkyee township
